description: Aspose.CAD is a library for working with CAD file formats. The library allows to export CAD drawings into Pdfs or any other raster image format. The library has a large scalable and easy to use API, it is a cross platform solution and performs CAD processing using the same set of algorithms for different platforms. Unlike other solutions does not require AutoCAD to be installed and is a fully managed solution.
releaseNotes:
Aspose.CAD for .Net public release version 16.10 and we are pleased to announce it.
      The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.CAD.

      New Features
      CADNET-134 Integrate metering module to promote new sales model for Aspose.CAD
	  
      Enhancements
      CADNET-164 Loading DGN file is throwing exception
      CADNET-156 Converting DWG to PNG format is producing very small PNG image that is unable to view
      CADNET-155 Adjust Metered module quota consumption algorythm
      CADNET-154 Fix application menu URLs
      CADNET-152 CAD Hatches Offsetting After Printing PDF
      CADNET-149 Converting DXF to Image is working but producing shapes with very thin lines; not of proper width of lines
      CADNET-147 Make Dgn exporter respects 'TypeOfEntities' rasterization property
      CADNET-137 Converting DWG to PDF is generating extra page at the end of PDF file
      CADNET-136 Low quality of pdf files generated by GDI Pdf exporter
      CADNET-133 Review and adapt architecture to CAD domain
      CADNET-132 Compound objects of a DGN drawing are not displayed
      CADNET-130 No GDI Pdf exporter available for DGN format
      CADNET-127 Add shortcuts to online documentation and other useful aspose resources
      CADNET-126 DGN exporter doesn't respect pen color
      CADNET-125 Text shifts unexpectedly during Model export
      CADNET-122 AutomaticLayoutsScaling does not work correctly
      CADNET-120 Some Patterns are missing while converting DXF to PDF format
      CADNET-117 GC overhead limit exceeded - exception when loading DWG file
      CADNET-108 Improve Image.GetFileFormat method to support raster image types
      CADNET-106 Improve exception text and improve exception architecture        

      Public API changes:
      CADNET-134 Integrate metering module to promote new sales model for Aspose.CAD

      Please note that Aspose.CAD product was split from Aspose.Imaging product and hence its public API is almost the same so you can easily migrate to Aspose.CAD by renaming your using namespaces to Aspose.CAD instead of Aspose.Imaging.

title: Aspose.CAD for .NET
